1996 wasare thurkiye isthanbul nuwara pawathi eksath jathinge manawa janawasa komisame dewana loka niwasa samulu p rakashanaye, thirasara nagarika ha janawasa sanwardhanayak thula samata p ramanawath niwasa sapayime sankalpayath, 1998 niwasa ha nagarika sanwardhana sandaha wu janadhipathi karya sadhana balaka warthawe nirdesha ha 2001 wasare eksath jathin wisin p rakashitha sahash ra sanwardhana ilakka da, salakillata ganimin sh ri lanka rajaya thirasara niwasa ha manawa janawasa sanwardhanayak thula niwasa gataluwen wadath pidawata path jana kandayam wenuwen wu niwasa wadasatahanwalata mul thanak labadena ladi.

mema sellama therum gatha yuthuyi.•seyid al husen lankawe gela sindinna oona yayi kiyaddi amerikawa na na gela sindinna nowa bada kapaganna kiyanawa.•widesha amathi mangala samarawira mahatha jiniwa wala pasugiyada kala kathawedi aluth usawi pihituwanna, aluth niladhariyo path karanna apa aparadha yukthiya sambandhayen aluth nithi gena eemata sudanam bawa kiya sitiya.
samahara prantha saha disthrikka amerikawe sampradayika ha pachcha ketime shilpin palanaya karayi.

tayi mahaththaya neth piya ganiyi narada nishshanka "chandiya", haralaksaya, "handaya", "maruwa samanga wase" wani wicharaka ha prekshaka prasadaya lada chithrapata adhyakshanaya kala wuda, shri lankika sinamaweth, rupawahini madhyayeth pragamanayata thama jiwithaye asamasamawu prathibhawa musukala wuda prathisampanna kalakaru kala suri tayitas thotawaththayo pereda (15 da) sadahatama jiwithayen samugathha.

man dannawa.bas rathaye siti gabbara kanthawak dutu kuda supun ema nonaාta kumak siduwi athdayi siya mawagen wimasuweya.hamawitama niyapothu hapime puruddata abbahi wi sitina supun ema purudden galawa ganimata upayak kalpana karamin siti supunge mawa mese kiwaya.“ee nonage bada loku wela thiyenneth oya wage niyapothu kala thamayi.”inpasu supun wadath oonakamin ema gabbara kanthawa desa balaා hindinnata wiya.supun thama desa wimathiyen bala sitinu dutu ema kanthawa mese asuwaya.“ayi babo mokada oya baya wela wage man diha balan inne”“man dannawa oyage bada loku wela thiyenne kohomada kiyala” supun perala ayata pilithuru dunneya.
